title: Create Exercise Tracking Components for VitaTrack
instruction: Implement comprehensive exercise tracking components for VitaTrack fitness monitoring. Create workout logging forms, exercise selection, set/rep tracking, and workout timer functionality. Implement exercise library browsing, custom exercise creation, and workout templates. Setup GPS tracking for outdoor activities, heart rate monitoring integration, and calorie burn display. Include workout history, personal records tracking, and exercise progression visualization. Create workout sharing and social features.
